name: GEO-FLO SAFE
description: GEO-FLO™ SAFE includes a specially formulated inhibitor package to help prevent corrosion and extend the life of the fluid, promoting long-term Geothermal system operation. It meets ASTM D1384 corrosion protection performance requirements and as a PG based fluid, GEO-FLO™ SAFE is compatible with all materials in geothermal installation including plastic pipes and metal components. Since it is propylene glycol based, GEO-FLO™ SAFE is nonflammable, resulting in improved safety, both for system installation and operation compared to alcohol-based fluids. s GEO-FLOTM SAFE, a premium propylene glycol based geothermal heat transfer fluid designed for use in all residential geothermal installation systems.
